description: A woman lives with her husband’s persistent infidelity.

title: THE MIRACLE AT SPEEDY MOTORS
author: Alexander McCall Smith
description: The ninth novel in the No. 1 Ladies’ Detective Agency series.

title: TAKE ONE
author: Karen Kingsbury
description: Christian filmmakers engage in a desperate attempt to keep their dream project from falling apart.

title: LUSH LIFE
author: Richard Price
description: An aspiring writer becomes a suspect in a friend’s murder on the Lower East Side.

title: 7TH HEAVEN
author: James Patterson and Maxine Paetro
description: Detective Lindsay Boxer and the Women’s Murder Club hunt for an arsonist.

title: CITY OF THIEVES
author: David Benioff
description: Two men arrested in World War II Russia must complete a seemingly impossible task to save their lives.

title: UNACCUSTOMED EARTH
author: Jhumpa Lahiri
description: Stories about the anxiety and transformation experienced by Bengali parents and their American children.

title: PRIDE AND PREJUDICE AND ZOMBIES
author: Jane Austen and Seth Grahame-Smith
description: The classic story, retold with “ultraviolent zombie mayhem.”

title: ANGELS AND DEMONS
author: Dan Brown
description: A scholar tries to save the Vatican from the machinations of an underground society.

title: CERTAIN GIRLS
author: Jennifer Weiner
description: A girl discovers the sexy, somewhat autobiographical novel her mother wrote years earlier.

title: COMFORT FOOD
author: Kate Jacobs
description: On the verge of turning 50, a cooking-show host juggles challenges with ratings, jealousy, motherhood and love.

title: BELONG TO ME
author: Marisa De Los Santos
description: When she moves to the suburbs, a woman becomes enmeshed in complications and secrets.

title: THE SECRET
author: Beverly Lewis
description: When her mother disappears, an Amish woman starts questioning all she thought she knew about life.
